caption.p: Adverse events in patients in the RCT.

fn.p: * The adverse events monitored also include acute hepatic decomposition, irreversible hepatic decompensation, respiratory failure or decompensation, biliary stricture or obstruction, liver abscess, gastrointestinal bleeding, arterial thrombosis, arterial-portal shunting. These events were not observed in the patients.
† Mild fever occurred to all patients.
